data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Burckhardt, Daniel, Bochud, Estée, Damgaard, Jakob, Gibbs, George W., Hartung, Viktor, Larivière, Marie-Claude, Wyniger, Denise, Zürcher, Isabelle (2011): A review of the moss bug genus Xenophyes (Hemiptera: Coleorrhyncha: Peloridiidae) from New Zealand: systematics and biogeography. Zootaxa 2923: 1-26, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.200936
